name: Super Brick Bros 2: A Machine for Bricks TURBO!
name_original: Super Brick Bros 2: A Machine for Bricks TURBO!
description:
Super Brick Bros 2: A Machine for Bricks TURBO! is a ridiculous, adventure-ish-type game in which you interact with a brick that spouts inanity, non sequiturs and insults all the while dragging you along to various locations around the world and beyond. I suppose you could describe it as a magic-talking-brick-simulator. Guaranteed to possibly supply seconds, maybe even minutes of enjoyment!

Features

  • Every playthrough is different
  • Random dialog
  • Immersive sound
  • Nifty graphical effects
  • Full colour
  • In stereo (where available)
  • Brick

Where is Super Brick Bros 1?

Brick Adventure was originally created by Amon26 and has never been available until now. It's available as a download when you purchase Super Brick Bros 2 (brick_adventure.zip, Windows and Mac only)!

System Requirements

Download includes versions for Windows, Mac, and Linux. Tested on Windows 7 64-bit, Mac OS X 10.9.2 Mavericks, Ubuntu Linux 12.04 LTS 64-bit. Has NOT been tested on 32-bit Windows or Linux! This game uses hardware accelerated effects and may not perform well on computers more than a few years old. It is also recommended that you update your drivers.

Android coming soon.
